summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East 58th Street from 17th Avenue Northeast to 18th Avenue Northeast and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8178 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
